title: Bug 15899 - Close all saved does not work all the time
OB: When the 'Close all saved' action is executed, all open files should be closed as no changes have been made.
EB: Currently, when the 'Close all saved' action is executed, some open files are not being closed even though no changes have been made.
SR: Fix the issue with the 'Close all saved' action so that it reliably closes all open files when no changes have been made.
